DOC.brief_summary: Does ultrasound increase success rate difference success rate place local anesthetic centrally versus peripherally .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Central Versus Peripheral Placement Local Anesthetic
DOC.detailed_description: A comparison infraclavicular placement local anesthetic either centrally ( posterior cord ) vs peripheral placement ( lateral medial cord ) use ultrasound guidance . This do determine ultrasound increase success rate difference success rate place local anesthetic centrally versus peripherally .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Class IIII . Patient undergo elective hand forearm surgery . Patient adult , 18 year old old . Morbid obesity ( calculate body mass index > 35 kg/m2 ) . Patient unable cooperate . Patient know brachial plexus injury . Medical contraindication anesthetic technique ( allergy , cardiac condition , neurologic condition , localized infection , bleed disorder ) . Patients pregnant .
